title: Doombots
body:
Doombots is coming and it's in PBE. Also to mention it's sorta different.

It is however in PBE.

Credits RedMercy for the Snap

replies.body: i've read everything about it on ff @ 20 and i'm pumped for this game mode. It sounds fun as fuck.
i've played this before, it's really fun. Though I did watch someone stream a bit of the game mode, only 2 new things added.

i doubt it, it seems like an entirely new mode.

22 bots, global curses, custom difficulty from 1-100,no enemy towers or nexus, survive 15 minutes only to face a giant devil teemo, defeat the final boss to win the game.

https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/441d40676d069b51730b1ea2e80c20dbd7ae9825989a72ae92d150f2b4e3c93c.jpg
BUUUUUUT ANYWAY. Still gonna play it hh hf :d
Two new things would be half map and a satanic teeto
